title: Bug 103963 - Friendly error message not appearing when there is no data for a series
OB: When there is no data for a series, no error message is displayed.
EB: When there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should pop up to remind the user.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the application.
2. Navigate to the series page.
3. Select a series that has no data.
4. Note the absence of any error message.
